name: Down With The Bourgeoisie
description:
By James Winter Griffin, Gennevieve Zitzman and Cameron Ayling for the AGDS week 7 game jam.

You must make your way through the government building, avoiding the guards and their guns, collecting keys, hiding on chandeliers and between pillars.

A/D - left/right
W - hide on chandelier/between pillars
S - come out of hiding
E - go up in elevator
Q - go down in elevator

Get to the flag to win.
